title: FAA Chart: VFR Sectional LAS VEGAS SLV (Current Edition)
features: High quality paper and print - Folded
Always in stock at Ruby & Rudy's Books
description: For VFR flyers who aviate in the Las Vegas, NV region, the FAA's Las Vegas Sectional Aeronautical chart is a low-cost, value-packed resource for all the relevant, safety-enhancing data they need to maintain situational awareness from takeoff to touchdown. As is characteristic of the FAA's entire lineup of sectional charts, the Las Vegas Sectional contains such need-to-know aeronautical data as airport info (runway lengths, lighting, elevation, services available, surface type, etc.); airspace dimensions; VHF and LF/MF navigational facilities (frequency, ID, and channel); landmarks; cities & towns; elevation/topographic info; ATC entities and associated contact/radio frequencies; bodies of water; obstructions; and much, much more.The Las Vegas Sectional covers much of Nevada, Utah, Northwestern Arizona, and even a portion of California. Uses the standard 1:500,000 (6.86 nm per inch; 2.70 nm per cm) scale characteristic of sectional charts. Updated every six months. An affordable, info-rich publication that should be an integral item in every area pilot's flight bag.
